title: Nursing Practice Competency Enhancement: Flipped Learning-Experiential Approach for Technical Problem-Solving for Executives

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of core business administration concepts and team project experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more core questions when analyzing technology-based business cases
Learners complete structured reports on complex technical problems through collaboration with subject matter experts (SMEs)
Learners improve decision-making quality by 20% or more using a 5-step checklist to evaluate the reliability of analysis results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
